Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu:
● Errata: This effect stops applying during the End Phase (not for the entire turn).

If this effect has resolved:
● That monster's effects that activate on the field are negated even if the monster leaves the field.
For example:
●When the affected monster activates it's effect, if "Raigeki Break", "Compulsory Evacuation Device", "Karma Cut" or "Phoenix Wing Wind Blast" is then chained, removing that monster from the field, the effect will still resolve negated.
● The effect of "Lonefire Blossom", or "Exiled Force" will resolve negated, the effect of "Reborn Tengu" or "Sangan" will resolve normally.

● If that monster is flipped face-down, its effects are no longer negated.
 For example:
● When the effect of a monster affected by "Effect Veiler" is activated, if "Book of Moon" is then chained, flipping that monster face-down, the effect will resolve successfully.

● If the monster that "Effect Veiler" targeted is no longer face-up on the fieldwhen "Effect Veiler"'s effect resolves, the monster’s effects are not negated.

●This effect can't negate the effects of a card that's already being negated. You cannot activate "Effect Veiler", targeting a monster that is being affected by "Skill Drain", "Forbidden Chalice" or another "Effect Veiler", for example.

● For infomation on resolving effects in the End Phase, please refer to this page:
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg

Rulings.Vegas:
● Errata: This effect stops applying during the End Phase (not for the entire turn).

If this effect has resolved: 
● That monster's effects on the field are negated even if it leaves the field 
● (EG, it can negate "Lonefire Blossom").
● If that monster is later flipped face-down, its effects are no longer negated.

Only effects which activate/apply on the field are negated.
● EG, "Cardcard D" and "Exiled Force" will be negated. 
● EG, "Mystic Tomato" or "Reborn Tengu" will not be negated.

This effect can't negate the effects of a card that's already being negated.
Rulings.Meadowlands:
● Errata: This effect stops applying during the End Phase (not for the entire turn).

If this effect has resolved: 
● That monster's effects on the field are negated even if it leaves the field 
● (EG, it can negate "Lonefire Blossom").
● If that monster is later flipped face-down, its effects are no longer negated.

Only effects which activate/apply on the field are negated.
● EG, "Cardcard D" and "Exiled Force" will be negated. 
● EG, "Mystic Tomato" or "Reborn Tengu" will not be negated.

This effect can't target a Normal Monster.
This effect can't negate the effects of a card that's already being negated.

● If that monster is later flipped face-down, its effects are no longer negated.

Only effects which activate/apply on the field are negated.
● EG, "Cardcard D" and "Exiled Force" will be negated. 
● EG, "Mystic Tomato" or "Reborn Tengu" will not be negated.

This effect can't negate the effects of a card that's already being negated.

Rulings.Base:
1. This card will negate effects that activate or apply on the field. It will not negate an effect that activates in the GY.
2. If you control the targeted monster when the effect of "Effect Veiler" resolves, the targeted monster's effect(s) will not be negated.
3. If the targeted monster is no longer face-up on the field when the effect of "Effect Veiler" resolves, the targeted monster's effect(s) will not be negated.
4. If the effect of "Effect Veiler" resolves, and the targeted monster is then flipped face-down, its effect(s) will no longer be negated, even if it is flipped face-up again later that turn.
5. If you target "Exiled Force" with "Effect Veiler" and your opponent Tributes "Exiled Force" to activate its effect later in the turn, the effect of "Exiled Force" will be negated.
6. [FORUM] The effect of "Effect Veiler" also applies to Continuous Effects. For example, "Effect Veiler" will negate the Continuous Effect of "Jinzo".
7. [FORUM] "Effect Veiler" will negate the effect of "Spirit Reaper". "Spirit Reaper" will not be destroyed by its own effect as its effect is now being negated.

PSCT.Edison: No rulings available for this card.
PSCT.Tengu:
① During your opponenet's Main Phase (Quick): 
You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects (until the End Phase).
